text: wadakhal hdyqth, wahu zalim linafsih bialkufr balbeth, wshkh fi qiam alsaet, faejbth thmarha wqal: ma 'aetaqid 'ana tahlik hadhih alhadiqat madaa alhyat, wama 'aetaqid 'ana alqiamat waqet, wa'iin furid wqweha -kma tazaeum 'ayuha almwmn- wrujet 'iilaa rabiy lajdnn eindah 'afdal min hadhih alhadiqat mrjeana wmrdana; lkramty wmnzlty endh
